ValidationRule.description: We need to have a linked primary contact during enrollment.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Enrolled"), OR( AND( ISBLANK(Contact__r.Id), ISPICKVAL(Relation_to_Baby__c, 'Mother') ), AND( ISBLANK(Contact2__r.Id), ISPICKVAL(Contact2_Relation_to_Baby__c, 'Mother') ), AND( ISBLANK(Contact__r.Id), ISPICKVAL(Relation_to_Baby__c, 'Father'), ISPICKVAL(Contact2_Relation_to_Baby__c, 'Father') ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must link a primary contact to this opportunity who is either the mother or the father.
